name: Spamwipe
description: Comment SPAM Wiper or Spamwipe API is a distributed solution for fighting comment SPAM that automatically filters the SPAM posts / comments. It can be integrated as a 3rd party comment spam plugin or comment spam module for your site. CSW protects your site from SPAM comments, posts, track-backs, ping-backs, etc.
